documentation.summary: Co-ordinates check of authorization and handles Auth failure. Should rarely be overridden.

documentation.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether more than one instance of the indicated attribute can be specified for a single program element.

Processes requests that fail authorization. This default implementation creates a new response with the Unauthorized status code. Override this method to provide your own handling for unauthorized requests.
Tests if the request passes the authorization requirements
documentation.param: The auth filter context
documentation.returns: True when authorization is succesful

documentation.summary: Called by framework at start of Auth process, check if auth should be skipped and handles auth failure. Should rarely need to be overridden.
Skips this authorization step if anonymous attribute is applied, override if auth should never be skipped, or other conditions are required

documentation.summary: Sets up the route(s) for DotNetNuke services
documentation.param: The name of the folder under DesktopModules in which your module resides
A unique name for the route
The parameterized portion of the route
Default values for the route parameters
The constraints
The namespace(s) in which to search for the controllers for this route
documentation.returns: A list of all routes that were registered.
documentation.remarks: The combination of moduleFolderName and routeName must be unique for each route

documentation.remarks: Content with more Comments is ranked higher.

Number of Likes associated with Content.
documentation.remarks: Content with more Likes is ranked higher.

documentation.remarks: Content with more Views is ranked higher.

documentation.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a postback to the server automatically occurs when the user changes the list selection.
documentation.returns: true if a postback to the server automatically occurs whenever the user changes the selection of the list; otherwise, false. The default is false.

documentation.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when a control is clicked.
Item to be displayed as first item
Register a list of JavaScript methods that are executed when the selection from the list control changes on the client.
Gets the selected item in the control, or selects the item in the control.
When this method returns, contains the 32-bit signed integer value equivalent to the number contained in SelectedItem.Value, if the conversion succeeded, or Null.NullInteger if the conversion failed.
DropDownList Caption when no Item is selected.
SelectedItem's value when SelectedItem is not explicitly specified (i.e. equals null); Always displayed as first option in the list
Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
Occurs when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server.

codeblock.body: [DataMember(Name = "rootId")] public string RootId = "Root";

method.name: LoadPostData
method.declaration: public override bool LoadPostData(string postDataKey, NameValueCollection postCollection)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Loads the Post Back Data and determines whether the value has change
In this case because the is a contained control, we do not need to process the PostBackData (it has been handled by the File Control). We just use this method as the Framework calls it for us.
A key to the PostBack Data to load A name value collection of postback data
[cnurse] 08/01/2006 created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

documentation.summary: This control is used for displaying a template based list of users based upon various filter and sorting capabilities.

Gets or sets the template for displaying the alternating row footers in a DnnMemberListControl object.

documentation.remarks: Posible keys are: RoleId, RelationshipTypeId, UserId, Profile:PropertyName, FirstName, LastName, DisplayName, Username, Email.

documentation.summary: Creates a control that renders its childs as a bulleted list.
documentation.remarks: Control renders an unordered list HTML contol. Each child control in is rendered as a separate list item. To obtain a control over list item style, add a to a controls list, and tune this object appropriately.

documentation.summary: A "macro" that adds a set of controls or control as a single list item (li). Use ListItems.Add(UnsortedListItem) method
documentation.remarks: All controls from the list will be rendered as a childs of a single list item.

documentation.summary: Creates a control that render one item in a list ($lt;li> control).
